description:
Demolition of existing lean-to ground floor side extension roof and replacement with a partially glazed flat roof. Existing ground floor side extension rear window enlarged.  Central courtyard between existing rear extension and parent building filled in. Juliet balcony facing the garden on the loft floor dormer replaced with a smaller sash window.	AC for the top two floors, unit located on roof next to chimney.
Internal reconfiguration.
decision_conditions:
Heritage Statement is required for properties where the proposal affects designated and/or non-designated heritageassets or their setting (Listed Buildings, Buildings of Townscape Merit, fall within a conservation area or have an Article 4 direction attached to it)

http://www.richmond.gov.uk/make_a_planning_application (Step 3)
http://www.richmond.gov.uk/media/13312/heritage_statements.pdf
